metadata.job_to_be_done: Create and manage fillable forms for onboarding and compliance.

subsection_analysis.refined_text: Tile Size: Divides the image being compressed into tiles of the given size. The default value of 256 is recommended. This option is available only for JPEG 2000 format.

Filter: Lets you select a filtering algorithm. None : Compresses the image without a filter. Recommended for indexed-color and Bitmap-mode images. Sub: Optimizes the compression of images with even horizontal patterns or blends.

To fill text fields: From the left panel, select Fill in form fields , and then select the field where you want to add text. Once you see the cursor and keypad, edit the text and then click elsewhere to enter. Note: Resize the first annotation you place to fit the check box or radio button in the document, and the next annotations you add will be of the same size and will fit the rest of the box/circle fields.
Caution: Once you add a signature or an initial to a form and save it, you cannot edit it again. To add your initials: From the Quick actions toolbar, select Add your signature or initials Select.
Mobile: Select this option to create your signature on a mobile device. Clicking the link opens the web browser on your mobile device where you can draw or select an image of your signature.
